title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4621 - Games Of Chance Currency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4621 - Games Of Chance Currency

State Regulations
§ 4621.1 - Permissible instruments for chance purchase
§ 4621.4 - Surrender of chips
§ 4621.8 - Control of sale of games of chance currency

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4621

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, §435; General Municipal Law, art. 9A; L. 1976, ch. 960

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
